This is just the right app for every person who has to travel a lot in trains and has to suffer its irregularity.
 This app is made by a group of curious young minds who want to build something innovative out of the trash. The app will be boon to whoever who loses his/her train because of sleep as this app comes with the built in alarm to wake you up before reaching the destination. Hope you find the app interewsting and useful.
